Package domain

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    the Board class represents a single battleship game board.
    BoardFactory
    a factory to create Board objects that are already populated with ships
    Game
    represents a battleship game
    GoldenRatioColorGenerator
    a helper class to generate some neat color schemes, adapted from http://devmag.org.za/2012/07/29/how-to-choose-colours-procedurally-algorithms/
    Location
    an immutable location structure
    PlacedShip
    represents a ship that has been assigned a location on a board
    Player
    represents a player of the battleships game
    PlayerFactory
    a factory for player objects, each player generated by PlayerFactory.create(String) is guaranteed to have a unique identifier and color.
    Ship
    represents a ship of the battleships game
    ShipFactory
    a factory for ship objects
    Team
    represents a team of a battleships game
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MapSlot
    indicates the status of a board slot
    Orientation
    represents an orientation vector in a 2 dimensional plane
    ShipType
    ship types used in most battleship games
